SemVerPlugin - Class in com.github.tagc.semver
An org.gradle.api.Plugin class that handles the application of semantic versioning logic to an org.gradle.api.Project

V

Version - Class in com.github.tagc.semver
Represents a semantic version number for a project.
Version.Builder - Class in com.github.tagc.semver
Version builder - allows for Version construction parameters to be selected incrementally.
Version.Category - Enum in com.github.tagc.semver
Version category enumeration - enumerates the major, minor and patch segments of version strings.
Version.Parser - Class in com.github.tagc.semver
Version parser - parses strings and constructs Version instances from them.

Constructs a Version with specified major, minor, patch and release properties.
